161.heading: Dufaux, Jean, 1949- --Miscellanea.
161.title: "La Toile et la Dague"
161.author: Yellow Kid
notes: Introduces an Aidans/Dufaux album, La Toile et la Dague 1: Le Mort sur le Bûcher.
Includes a brief bio-bibliography of Aidans by Michel Denni, and a sidebar by Paul Curie about the Tounga series.
